more or less i'm referring to the SLI benefit, and that requires a duplicate,
regardless, you might want to consider a dual dvi out, so you can do dual monitors
nvidia's drivers are *Excellent* at doing that, i know, i'm doing it now, i have one running metacity, and the other doing compiz
on different X displays
and i can still drag my mouse between them, even though they are independent
put simply, i can watch a movie on one, and play WoW on the other
with no loss in performance
compiz won't run on multiple x displays, hence the metacity thing, and i don't like the 'big desktop' option
b/c then 'full screen' always goes across both displays, and my displays are different dimensions, i.e. ones an upgrade of the other ;)
and you still spending 55 euro, a minor upgrade to the 7000 series would add a lot of features ...
